title: Hosting a potluck dinner
context: Tell your friends to bring their favorite side dish or dessert to your house.

content.bestLine: Bring your favorite side dish or dessert to share

neutral.text: Please bring a dish to pass
What side dish can you bring?
We're having a potluck, what's your favorite dish?
Bring something to share with the group
Please contribute to the potluck with a dish
We're counting on your culinary skills
Bring enough for everyone to try some

informal.text: Bring your fave dish to share
Let's make this a potluck to remember
Your dish is always the best
Don't forget to bring a dish to share

formal.text: You are invited to bring a dish to share
Please contribute a side dish or dessert
We would appreciate it if you could bring a dish
A potluck dinner is planned, please bring a dish
Your participation in the potluck is appreciated
We look forward to tasting your culinary creation

patterns.meaning: Contribute to the potluck with a dish
Participate in the potluck by bringing a dish

dialogs.description: Inviting a friend to a potluck dinner

lines.speaker: Host
lines.text: Hey, we're having a potluck dinner at my place, want to come?

lines.speaker: Friend
lines.text: That sounds like fun, what can I bring?

dialogs.description: Discussing potluck details with a guest

lines.speaker: Host
lines.text: So, what dish are you planning to bring to the potluck?

lines.speaker: Guest
lines.text: I was thinking of bringing my famous lasagna, is that okay?
